name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XDW, JTD, MDI Viewer and Converter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Viewer allows you to view a DocuWorks XDW, Ichitaro JTD, Microsoft MDI file without having program installed on the machine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This XDW/JTD/MDI Viewer allows you to view a DocuWorks XDW, XBD, Ichitaro JTD, Microsoft MDI file without having program installed on the machine. You can easily convert your XDW, JTD, MDI files to PDF format with this tool.

You can convert this XDW, JTD, MDI formats to a PDF that can be viewed as a web PDF viewer. You can open a file from local computer, Google Drive, Dropbox, and Box.

An XDW file is a file saved in the DocuWorks image format used by Fuji Xerox scanners and copiers. It may contain both images and text.
A JTD file is a document created by Ichitaro, a Japanese word processor. It may contain formatted text, images, tables, graphs, and page formatting.
A MDI file is a document saved in a high-resolution, tag-based graphics format. It is created by Microsoft Office to save scanned documents.

This extension is easily accessible via the Chrome context menu on the top-right toolbar. you will find menus there.
Supported formats: xdw, xbd, jtd, mdi, jfw, jvw, jtdc, jtt.. and more.
